attributes.action: consider his position as the previous incumbent of the Treasury in the light of HMRC's incompetence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HMRC have endangered the personal security of millions of British people by their cavalier attitude in the handling of confidential data.
As the PM was until recently in charge of the Treasury and thus HMRC (in fact the Revenue and Customs were merged under his tenure) we the undersigned call upon him to reflect upon his position rather than leaving others to carry the can.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
